Kernelizr - Class in <Unnamed>
Processes an image with a multithreaded, dynamic kernel-based image filtering algorithm.

KKernel - Class in <Unnamed>
A non-dynamic kernel, with floating point data.

KOps - Class in <Unnamed>

KTask - Class in <Unnamed>
